::Autofire::

Autofire watches Megatron stand up and look him over, his scanners 
determining that Megatron was almost out of energy. He laughs when 
Megatron explains why he had come here.

"Right," he says, his tone indicating what he thought of Megatron's 
explanation. "You came here, nearly dead from lack of energon, simply 
to restore me to be a leader of a long-extinct faction. I'm honored."

His chain gun flips to his hand again, firing off a round that barely 
misses Megatron's head.

"I'm not a fool, Megatron, and I know you arn't one either. I will 
expect the truth from you next time."

His chain gun flips back into his wrist. "Now, would you care to 
restate your reasons for being here?"
